title: When waking up
ar: الْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
en: All praise is to Allah, Who gave us life...

title: When wearing a garment
ar: الْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا (الثَّوْبَ) وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
en: All Praise is to Allah Who has clothed me...

title: Before undressing
en: In the Name of Allah.

title: When waking up at night
ar: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ...
en: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah...

title: Morning Supplication 1
en: O Allah, by You we enter the morning...

title: Morning Supplication 2
en: We have entered a new day upon the natural religion of Islam...

title: Evening Supplication 1
en: We have reached the evening and at this very time...

title: Evening Supplication 2
en: O Allah, by You we enter the evening...

title: Before entering the toilet
ar: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
en: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from all evil...

title: After leaving the toilet
en: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness.

title: Before Wudu
en: In the Name of Allah.

title: After Wudu
ar: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ...
en: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah...

title: When going to the mosque
en: O Allah, place light in my heart...

title: Upon entering the mosque
en: O Allah, open the doors of Your mercy for me.

title: Upon leaving the mosque
en: O Allah, I ask You from Your favor.

title: After the Adhan
en: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call...

title: When leaving the house
en: In the Name of Allah, I have placed my trust in Allah...

title: When entering the house
ar: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللهِ خَرَجْنَا...
en: In the Name of Allah we enter...

title: Mounting an animal or vehicle
en: Glory is to Him Who has provided this for us...

title: For travel
ar: اللهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللهُ أَكْبَرُ...
trans: Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar...
en: Allah is the greatest... O Allah, we ask You on this our journey for goodness and piety...

title: Entering a town or village
ar: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَظْلَلْنَ...
en: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens...

title: Returning from travel
en: We return, repent, worship and praise our Lord.

title: When in distress
ar: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ الْعَظِيمُ الْحَلِيمُ
en: There is none worthy of worship but Allah the Mighty, the Forbearing.

title: For anxiety and sorrow
en: O Allah, I am Your slave and the son of Your male slave...

title: Upon encountering an enemy
en: O Allah, we place You before them...

title: When afraid of people
en: O Allah, protect me from them with what You choose.

title: When faced with a difficult task
ar: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلاً
trans: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja'altahu sahlan...
en: O Allah, there is no ease other than what You make easy...

title: For settling a debt
en: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed...

title: Before eating
en: In the Name of Allah.

title: Forgetting to say Bismillah
en: In the Name of Allah, in the beginning and in the end.

title: Upon completing the meal
en: All praise is to Allah Who has fed me this...

title: When breaking the fast
en: The thirst has gone and the veins are quenched...

title: When someone offers you food
en: O Allah, feed him who fed me...

title: When drinking milk
ar: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيهِ وَزِدْنَا مِنْهُ
trans: Allahumma baarik lana feehi wa zidna minhu
en: O Allah, bless us in it and give us more of it.
